author: Test Poet
title: Test Poem One
text:
Love is like the summer rain,
Falling softly on my heart.
Numbers like 6 and 80 remain,
When we are far apart.

❤️ forever ❤️

author: Test Poet
title: ＊✿❀ Digital Dreams ❀✿＊
text:
i write in lowercase
because CAPITALS are for
SERIOUS THINGS

like paying taxes
and forgetting passwords

author: Alt-lit Poet
title: Modern Feelings
text:
my phone died
at 3am
while texting you

i felt more alone
than when
my grandmother
passed away

author: Unicode Poet
title: ❤️ Special Characters Test ❤️
text:
＊✿❀ ☁️ testing unicode ❀✿＊
🌙 moon emoji here 🌙
and numbers: 1, 2, 3, 42
and MiXeD cAsE words
